messages.message:
Sr. .Net Programmer Analyst Opportunity in Tempe!
smierau@apexsystemsinc.com

This position is with American Airlines and is a yearly contract (it's looking to last around 2-3 years)! If you'd like, I can give you a call and we can go over the details for the position, see if you are interested.
Sorry, no contracts. I don't want to manager to think I am not a part of the team.
